top.title: Benin coup attempt foiled by loyalist troops, interior minister says
top.summary: A presidential adviser has told the BBC that President Talon is safe and is at the French embassy.

top.title: Nightclub fire in India's Goa kills 25 people including staff and tourists
top.summary: Eyewitnesses described scenes of panic in one of Goa's bustling nightlife areas.

top.title: Ukrainian city hit by 'massive' strike as peace talks in US conclude
top.summary: Russia carried out strikes on Kremenchuk, while its defence ministry said it had shot down 77 Ukrainian drones in several locations.

top.title: Twitch star QTCinderella says she wishes she never started streaming
top.summary: The Streamer Awards organiser said the negatives of her online role made it hard to enjoy the job.

top.title: US hits out at EU's 'suffocating regulations' after it fines Elon Musk's X
top.summary: The European Commission says the social media site is opening its users up to scams and impersonations.

top.title: Porn site fined £1m over age checks has never responded to Ofcom
top.summary: The regulator tells the BBC it has been emailing AVS Group Ltd without reply since July.
